dsml_meetup_2025.title: DSML MEETUP 2025
dsml_meetup_2025.subtitle: Central Asia's Largest Data & AI Community Returns After 6 Years!
dsml_meetup_2025.description_1: After 6 years since our last major offline meetup in 2019, we are gathering our Community again!
dsml_meetup_2025.description_2: You will be welcomed by new connections and interesting talks from dsml.kz residents about machine learning and artificial intelligence applications across a wide spectrum of industry and academic research directions.
dsml_meetup_2025.speakers_note: And many other speakers from the DSML community!

max.name: Maxat Tezekbayev
max.role: Senior ML Engineer at Kolesa Group

dsml_meetup_2025.discount: 50% discount for undergraduate students and school students
